Row.Text: Unable to harvest resources, forest and jungle terrain +1 food +2 faith, water mill extra +2 culture and provide +1 production for all freshwater plots in the city.
All units recover +10, and all units can be purchased with faith points.
Fishing boats +1 production, +1 food, maritime merchants are immune to plunder, plunder extra +50%, urban war exhaustion is reduced by 50%, sailing technology is free.
Capital of Freedom and the Sea
Cancel the debuff of the health value to the combat power, and +25% production when producing sea units.
Immune to sandstorm damage, give oasis +2 gold +2 culture, and cities without a governor's inauguration +10% of all yields.

When the enemy spy is located in the territory of the city where he owns the governor, the action level is -1, and every luxury in the destination international city provides +2 culture + 2 gold for the trade route.
All units ignore jungle and forest mobility and vision debuffs.
The Order of the Twin Adder
Replace the archer. Start an action in own city, +1 mobility + 10 combat power.
Alternative workshops. Consume less production, extra +3 faith value, +1 production, +1 culture, +1 housing.
Instead of holy site, it can only be built on the forest. The expert population provides 2 points of culture, +1 faith and food for each adjacent tree.
Can not be built next to each other, additional +2 faith, +2 production. +1 production for nearby rivers.
The Golden Age provides 1 point of mobility, and the Dark Age +5 combat power.
Instead of the swordsman, there is +5 combat power for every same unit nearby.
Alternative temple. Extra +4 gold and culture, giving two extra relics fields.
Alternative entertainment center. Provides 1 point of generals and 2 points of additional city defense. Each adjacent area + 2 culture + 2 gold.
Cannot be built next to each other, +2 gold, +1 culture, +1 production, and provide +10 defense for the unit.
All units do not need corresponding technology to enter the ocean.
Instead of scouts, it has an extra +1 mobility and +10 combat power.
Alternative market. In addition, +2 culture, +1 great engineer, +1 great scientist.

Alternative harbor. The adjacent city center provides +4 gold for it. Each luxury item provides an additional livability for cities with customs. And provide defense and long-range attack power of the barracks.
Cannot be built next to each other. Each different landform of the city is its +1 gold, +1 culture, and +1 production.
